short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will validate HTML on a page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're tired of cutting and pasting the URL to the web page that you want to validate, simply click on this extensions browser icon and be taking to a fully HTML Validated page.  Uses the W3 Validator web page.
